text:
*3Hacking your way through every demon in your path, you leap through the
portal without a moment's hesitation. It seems no entity, mortal or
immortal, can challenge your power.
^
*3Suddenly, you find yourself standing wearily in an endless white hall dotted
with enormous pillars that stretch higher than you can see. Your servos
are too worn to support you any further, and you collapse to the ground.
*2Can this supernatural place compete with Minotaurs, Demons; Baphomet himself?
You detect great magic flowing into the room. A voice booms:
^
*2"We are impressed with your ability, servile one. You were not expected here.
We ask you consider this proposition..."
^
*3As the voice addresses you, you find yourself either unwilling or unable
to reject what it tells you. Eventually, you detect a transfer of consciousness,
and you feel your body being transported a great distance.
^
*3You sense the supreme power of a great mind as you fade from the mortal world.
The first age comes to a close, and the age of chaos begins. You are sure that
your time is emminent and your purpose will be fulfilled.
